name: Sliding Puzzle (Metallic Fist Digital Limited)
description:
Experience nostalgia by playing classic sliding puzzle game on your mobile phones. 

Remember this? Now relive the experience on your mobile phones.

Bringing the touch of modern era to classic game. The puzzles are based on your all time favorite android games. This game will constantly bring out your old memories and provide an opportunity to cherish them once again.

Simple, clean and beautiful. Isn't it?

Requirements:- 
Download the attached APK file to install and play the game. For instructions on how to install .apk files on your Android device follow this link: https://www.wikihow.tech/Install-APK-Files-on-Android

Supported on all Android versions greater than 4.2 Jellybean.
